text: Viktor Rossi (born 31 October 1968) is a Swiss politician. He is a member of the Green Liberal Party. He is the current Federal Chancellor of Switzerland since 2024. Rossi was the Vice-Chancellor of Switzerland from 2019 to 2023. == References == Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Federal Chancellors of Switzerland Category:People from Bern
title: Viktor Rossi
